## unionType() function

Constructs a [Type](./paratype.type.md) that represents a union of other types.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function unionType<T extends Type<unknown>[]>(...types: T): Type<TypeOf<T[number]>>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  types | T |  |
